thread.title: Watch List for Oct. 10
thread.title_full: Watch List for Oct. 10 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Watch List for Oct. 10
text:
LIVE EVENTS
College Hockey
• Penn State at Canisius, 7:35 p.m., HarborCenter.
Horse Racing
• Batavia Downs, 6:35 p.m.
NHL
• Tampa Bay at Buffalo, 1 p.m., First Niagara Center.
ON TELEVISION
Auto Racing
• Formula One Russian Grand Prix Practice 3, 6 a.m., NBCSN.
• Formula One Russian Grand Prix Qualifying, 8 a.m., NBCSN.
• Sprint Cup Bank of America 500, 7:15 p.m., NBC.
Boxing
• Danny O’Connor vs. Gabriel Bracero, 8 p.m., NBCSN.
College Football
• Texas at Oklahoma, noon, ABC.
• Central Michigan at Western Michigan, noon, WNYO.
• LSU at South Carolina, noon, ESPN.
• Indiana at Penn State, noon, ESPN2.
• Illinois at Iowa, noon, ESPNU.
• UTEP at FIU, noon, WNYO.
• William & Mary at Villanova, noon, SNY.
• Virginia at Pittsburgh, 12:30 p.m., WNLO.
• James Madison at Towson, 3 p.m., SNY.
• Wake Forest at Boston College, 3 p.m., YES.
• Navy at Notre Dame, 3:30 p.m., NBC.
• Georgia at Tennessee, 3:30 p.m., CBS.
• Minnesota at Purdue, 3:30 p.m., ESPN.
• Wisconsin at Nebraska, 3:30 p.m., ABC.
• Georgia Tech at Clemson, 3:30 p.m., ESPN2.
• Connecticut at Central Florida, 3:45 p.m., ESPNU.
• Iowa State at Texas Tech, 4 p.m., MSG.
• Arkansas at Alabama, 7 p.m., ESPN.
• Oklahoma State at West Virginia, 7 p.m., ESPN2.
• East Carolina at BYU, 7:30 p.m., ESPNU.
• TCU at Kansas State, 7:30 p.m., FOX.
• Miami (Fla.) at Florida State, 8 p.m., ABC.
• California at Utah, 10 p.m., ESPN.
• Wyoming at Air Force, 10:15 p.m., ESPN2.
Golf
• LPGA Tour, Sime Darby Malaysia, 11 a.m., Golf.
• Champions Tour, SAS Championship, 1 p.m., Golf.
• PGA Tour, Presidents Cup, 3:30 p.m., Golf.
MLB
• NLDS Game 2: Chicago Cubs at St. Louis, 5:30 p.m., TBS.
• NLDS Game 2: N.Y. Mets at L.A. Dodgers, 9 p.m., TBS.
NHL
• Tampa Bay at Buffalo, 1 p.m., MSG.
ON RADIO
College Football
• Georgia Tech at Clemson, 3:30 p.m., 1520.
College Hockey
• Niagara at Clarkson, 7 p.m., 1340.
High School Football
• Frontier at Lockport, 2 p.m., 1340.
NHL
• Tampa Bay at Buffalo, 1 p.m., 550.
